Chapter.Name: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES, DIPLOMATIC AND CONSULAR RELATIONS, ETC

ExternalData.Titlesect: Convention on the Privileges and Immunities of the Specialized Agencies

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 2 December 1948, in accordance with section 44. The Convention first entered into force as regards the Netherlands by the deposit of the instrument of accession undertaking to apply the provisions of the Convention to various specialized agencies.

TreatyNote.Text: States that are parties to the Convention are listed in the Participant table below. For the lists of States applying the provisions of the Convention to the respective specialised agencies, see chapters III.2.1 to III.2.17.
